resources.string: Hi, this is a new Netology! Once upon a time, Netology began with intensive courses in online marketing. Then came courses in design, markup, analytics , and management. We grow by ourselves and help students grow: from beginners to confident professionals. But the most important thing happens to us: we believe that everyone already has the power to want more, aim higher, and run faster. Our mission - help to embark on the path of growth and start the chain changes -> http://netolo.gy/fyb
